publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1121# Ms Sandra White: Glasgow North/South Rail Link-That the Parliament notes Her Majesty's Government's Spending Review 2000 and urges the Scottish Executive to allocate funds from the Scottish share of the review for the development of the Glasgow north/south crossrail scheme or any similar scheme which facilitates the linking of the Glasgow's north and south rail networks.
S1M-1121# Glasgow North/South Rail Link (lodged on 15 August 2000) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-1121# Glasgow North/South Rail Link (lodged on 15 August 2000) Michael Russell*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*

S1M-1121# Ms Sandra White: Glasgow North/South Rail Link-That the Parliament notes Her Majesty's Government's Spending Review 2000 and urges the Scottish Executive to allocate funds from the Scottish share of the review for the development of the Glasgow north/south crossrail scheme or any similar scheme which facilitates the linking of the Glasgow's north and south rail networks. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Michael Russell, Mr Lloyd Quinan
S1M-1121# Glasgow North/South Rail Link (lodged on 15 August 2000) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-1121# Glasgow North/South Rail Link (lodged on 15 August 2000) Alex Neil*

S1M-1121# Ms Sandra White: Glasgow North/South Rail Link-That the Parliament notes Her Majesty's Government's Spending Review 2000 and urges the Scottish Executive to allocate funds from the Scottish share of the review for the development of the Glasgow north/south crossrail scheme or any similar scheme which facilitates the linking of the Glasgow's north and south rail networks. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Michael Russell, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Andrew Wilson, Alex Neil
S1M-1121# Glasgow North/South Rail Link (lodged on 15 August 2000) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-1121# Glasgow North/South Rail Link (lodged on 15 August 2000) Tricia Marwick*
S1M-1121# Glasgow North/South Rail Link (lodged on 15 August 2000) Robert Brown*

S1M-1121# Ms Sandra White: Glasgow North/South Rail Link-That the Parliament notes Her Majesty's Government's Spending Review 2000 and urges the Scottish Executive to allocate funds from the Scottish share of the review for the development of the Glasgow north/south crossrail scheme or any similar scheme which facilitates the linking of the Glasgow's north and south rail networks. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Michael Russell, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Andrew Wilson, Alex Neil, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Gil Paterson, Tricia Marwick, Robert Brown
